title: Morocco Oceanfront Wellness Retreat with Daily Breakfast, EUR100 Spa Credit & 18-Hole Golf Course
description:
Escape the noise at this elegant wellness oasis, perfectly positioned between Casablanca and Rabat along the golden shores of Bouznika Beach. With endless ocean vistas, both indoor and outdoor pools and advanced wellness facilities ranging from balneotherapy and a Japanese sauna to restorative massages, relaxation becomes an art form here.

Begin your mornings with a decadent breakfast at Le V, then spend hours lounging poolside with refreshments from Le Dielli. Perfect your swing at the sprawling onsite golf couse then head to Le Chiringuito, the resort’s Mediterranean-inspired restaurant, where DJ sets, the fresh ocean breeze and a lively ambiance set the tone.
offer_address: Bahia Golf Beach, Route Côtière km 44, Bouznika 13100, Morocco
